description.value: With more desaturated and tame colorations, windrisen ixudo are the bottom of ixudo society. They often receive the roles of foot-soldiers, guards, and hunters.

system.classDetails:
Windrisen Ixudo Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Attribute Increase: Your Strength increases by 1.
  • Weapon Proficiency: You have proficiency in two martial weapons of your choice.
  • Toothed Beak: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.7RYXNBTK2K3BISJH]{Toothed Beak}
